prompt: This is a tablet computer with a touchscreen, and a stylus that can be used on the touchscreen like a pen. Who might want a computer like this one?
feedback: This computer might be used for drawing high-resolution images, but a professional artist working on very detailed artwork would be more likely to want a large monitor and a desktop computer with an artist’s drawing tablet. This computer is small and portable because of the touchscreen, so it’s easy to use on the go, so an artist who wants to do drawings away from home is the best answer. A musician would probably want some different features, like headphones to listen to the music, and a writer would probably want a keyboard.
